1000001110001000 1100011001101101 1 -> sum: 0100100111110110, cout: 1

1110000110001111 1111100101110100 0 -> sum: 1101101100000011, cout: 1
0000011010111111 0010010001110111 1 -> sum: 0010101100110111, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
